999900.name: Studio by RADiCAL
999900.description:
STUDIO by RADiCAL brings our AI to your own local machine, as a fully-integrated capture and visualization solution.

Almost entirely untethered from the cloud, the RADiCAL Studio allows you to process unlimited amounts of animations, powered entirely by your local hardware, with visualizations right on your local screens.

Once you’re ready, select the animation you like and have your data exported in FBX for ingestion into your content pipeline.

With RADiCAL Studio, you are also able to livestream your motion in to Unreal Engine in real-time.

Please check out our website for more information on how to enable Unreal Engine LiveLink access.

No hardware, no suits, no effort: Just install the software on your machine, turn on your webcam, and create.

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS:

RADiCAL Studio requires Windows 10 and an NVIDIA GPU. We recommend at least having a GeForce GTX 1070 to be able to run our AI. Please see the system requirements tab for more details.

No other apps should be running while you are capturing with RADiCAL Studio.
